name: Cleansing Ritual
description: Exalt in the sacred light of the Aedra, cleansing up to 2 harmful effects from yourself immediately and healing you and nearby allies for 870 every 2 seconds for 12 seconds.  Allies in the area can activate the Purify synergy, cleansing all harmful effects from themselves and healing for 1886 Health.
coefDescription: Exalt in the sacred light of the Aedra, cleansing up to 2 harmful effects from yourself immediately and healing you and nearby allies for $1 every 2 seconds for 12 seconds.  Allies in the area can activate the Purify synergy, cleansing all harmful effects from themselves and healing for $2 Health.
